lead_paragraph: Hitachi, one of Japan's biggest electronic firms, said Wednesday that it was considering listing its hard-drive unit in the United States.
snippet: Hitachi, one of Japan's biggest electronic firms, said Wednesday that it was considering listing its hard-drive unit in the United States.

headline.main: Hitachi Mulls I.P.O. of Hard-Drive Business

abstract: Hitachi, one of Japan's biggest electronic firms, said Wednesday that it was considering listing its hard-drive unit in the United States.
